text:
Utilization of Channels betv/een 25 and i90 megacycles.
Your comments are nuoted below:
a) GERTRUDE BRODERICK: "I am in complete agreement. By
all means let us file comments supporting continuance of the
FM educational frequencies, as well as the television assignments
in the bands presently occupied."
b) VERNON BRONSON: "Support continuance of present
assignments."
c) R. J. COLEMaN: "We have supported the continuance of
FM frequencies for many years. Just last year we recommended
such a "resolution. Perhaps it is not necessary to restate
this to the Commission unless it seems necessary as repeat
oressure. The matter of rulemaking on the reallocation of
frequencies is not a new one. I recommend a vigilant attitude
with our exact position to be determined if and when the
Commission starts rulemaking action."
d) JACK MCBRIDE: "...I agree with your recommendation
as ststed.”
e) BURTON PAULU: "We should support the continuation of
the FM educational reservation, with reference to the desirability
of continuing television assignments as at present."
f) R. F. SOHENKKaN: "as you say, this Provides a pretty
formidable topic. I would like to see such data as Lennie
can provide if it can be distributed. Meanwhile, I heartily
approve your recommendation ‘that we support the continuance
of the FM educational reservations, with reference to the
desirability of continuing the television assignments as at
present*."
g) ART WELD: "Strongly approve support FM reservations."
ACTION:
continuance
spectrum.
I am requesting Marks to file in support of
